name: Trijam 68 - Safe Spot
description:
Use WASD, ZQSD or arrows to try to navigate your ship safely to the blue safe spot, without being buster bu the green radar, so keep your distance with this detection grid ! This is a little "Puzzle action" game where you must find your way through.

If you fail, you can retry or start a new random generated level.

Tips : try to find intermediate safe spot, even if they are not in blue they exist.

This is the first project I ever managed to finish, but only because of the 3 hours fixed time limit. Sorry, I would love to have implemented difficulty setting, sound effects, more level (with the difficulty settings) and a little narrative. And correct bugs :p Please do not try too much to resize the frame.

Using assets from Asset Jam for the starship (fungifurball whi uploaded for Asset Jam 7).

Dev stopped after 3h00...
